entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
